metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4014 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The capabilities implementation in the Linux kernel before 3.14.8 does notproperly consider that namespaces are inapplicable to inodes, which allowslocal users to bypass intended chmod restrictions by first creating a usernamespace, as demonstrated by setting the setgid bit on a file with groupownership of root.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4014` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
